personal.name: Rachael Dias
personal.title: AI Engineer & Computer Science Graduate
personal.bio: Passionate Computer Science graduate specializing in AI and machine learning. Currently working as an AI intern connecting LLMs with databases and building sales forecasting pipelines. Published researcher in AI collaboration with a unique focus on crochet pattern translation using Large Language Models.
personal.tagline: Building AI magic, one algorithm at a time

description: Utilizing LangGraph to connect LLMs with company databases to derive insights
Implementing sales-forecasting pipelines using BigQueryML, delivering forecasts for multiple clients
Working on cutting-edge AI solutions for business intelligence
achievements: Successfully connected multiple company databases with LLMs
Delivered accurate sales forecasting models for clients
Contributed to AI-driven business intelligence solutions

experience.position: Enterprise Software Engineer & Data Science Intern
description: Created a customer portal for freight forwarding solutions in Angular.js
Used D3.js for interactive dashboards and visualizing route information
Developed full-stack solutions for logistics industry
achievements: Built comprehensive customer portal for freight forwarding
Created interactive dashboards for route visualization

description: Assisted in teaching labs and grading assignments for Computer Science students
Mentored students in programming concepts and problem-solving
Supported faculty in delivering quality education
achievements: Successfully guided students through complex programming concepts
Maintained high standards in assignment grading
Contributed to improved student learning outcomes

description: Created a Reimbursement Claim application using the Microsoft Power Platform
achievements: Gained experience with Microsoft enterprise solutions

projects.title: Crochet Pattern Translation using LLMs
projects.description: First structured dataset for crochet and fine-tuned LLMs for pattern translation
projects.longDescription: Created the first structured dataset for crochet and fine-tuned various open-source LLMs for crochet pattern translation. Published at AAAI's Symposium on Human-AI Collaboration as 'Translation of User Crochet Patterns to CrochetPARADE syntax using Large Language Models'.

projects.title: Sales Forecasting with BigQueryML
projects.description: ML pipelines for sales forecasting delivering predictions for multiple clients
projects.longDescription: Developed and implemented sales-forecasting pipelines using BigQueryML at Convz FZE, delivering accurate forecasts for multiple clients. Integrated with LangGraph to connect LLMs with company databases for enhanced insights.

projects.title: Freight Forwarding Customer Portal
projects.description: Customer portal with interactive dashboards for freight forwarding solutions
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive customer portal for freight forwarding solutions using Angular.js at CircleBit. Created interactive dashboards with D3.js for visualizing route information and logistics data.

projects.title: Microsoft Power Platform Reimbursement App
projects.description: Business automation solution for reimbursement claims processing
projects.longDescription: Developed a Reimbursement Claim application using the Microsoft Power Platform at The First Group. Automated business processes and improved efficiency in expense management workflows.

extraCurriculars.description: Part of a global group of campus leaders who are eager to help fellow students and develop technical and career skills for the future.
Guiding a team of high-school girls to create an application using Flutter to complete the online Technovation curriculum.
